ggplotd.legend



auto continuousLegend(int width = 80, int height = 70);
Create a legend using a continuous scale

Params:
int width Optional width in pixels
int height Optional height in pixels

auto discreteLegend(int width = 80, int height = 70);
Create a legend using a discrete scale

Params:
int width Optional width in pixels
int height Optional height in pixels

auto drawContinuousLegend(CR, CG)(ref cairo.Surface surface, int width, int height, CR colourStore, CG colourGradient);
Draw a legend for a continuous value to the given surface

auto drawDiscreteLegend(CR, CG)(ref cairo.Surface surface, int width, int height, CR colourStore, CG colourGradient);
Draw a legend for a discrete value to the given surface
